article_title: What? President Obama Thinks Obamacare Is Working 'Better Than Intended'?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: President Obama's reaction to yesterday House vote to repeal Obamacare was astonishing. "This is working not just as intended, but better than intended" he declared at a White House meeting with 10 people purported to have benefited from the law. Call me gob-smacked. President Obama either has an exceedingly poor memory or is (yet again) engaging in some serious truth-twisting regarding Obamacare. As we'll see, President Obama has earned an F on the five biggest promises he made about his law. Moreover, relative to CBO projections, Obamacare has achieved at worst 50% of what was expected or at best 88%. If the president really intended for his law to achieve such dismal results, he should have told us that five years ago.
